SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.reportviews

Class SecurityCostGrand<S,T>

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.reportviews.MapGroup<S,T>
grafioschtrader.reportviews.SecurityCostGrand<S,T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
SecurityDividendsGrandTotal, TransactionCostGrandSummary
public abstract class SecurityCostGrand<S,T> extends MapGroup<S,T>
Abstract base class for creating grand totals and comprehensive summaries of security-related costs across multiple groupings. Provides the foundation for enterprise-level cost analysis by aggregating costs from various group summaries and calculating meaningful statistics for cost optimization and trend analysis.

This generic base class establishes the pattern for creating comprehensive cost reports that span multiple dimensions (accounts, currencies, time periods, etc.) while maintaining proper currency precision and providing standardized statistical calculations for cost analysis.

Core Capabilities:

  • Aggregation of costs across multiple group summaries
  • Grand total calculations for transaction and tax costs
  • Enterprise-wide average cost calculations
  • Multi-currency normalization with proper precision handling
  • Flexible grouping strategy through generic type parameters

    • currencyPrecisionMap

      protected Map<String,Integer> currencyPrecisionMap
      Currency precision configuration map defining decimal places for each currency code. Ensures accurate monetary calculations and proper rounding according to each currency's standard precision requirements.

    • precisionMC

      protected int precisionMC
      Number of decimal places for monetary precision in the main currency. Used for consistent rounding of all grand total values in the reporting currency.

  • Method Details

    • getSecurityCostGroup

      public abstract SecurityCostGroup getSecurityCostGroup(T groupSummary)
      Abstract method that extracts the security cost group from a specific group summary. Enables polymorphic access to cost group functionality regardless of the specific group summary implementation, supporting flexible grouping strategies.
      Parameters:
      groupSummary - the group summary from which to extract the cost group
      Returns:
      the security cost group for aggregation and calculation operations

    • caclulateGrandSummary

      public void caclulateGrandSummary()
      Calculates comprehensive grand totals by aggregating costs from all group summaries. This method coordinates the calculation process across all groups, ensuring each group's totals are current before performing enterprise-level aggregation.
